ygData.subject: RE: Bard vs Wizard race?
ygData.msgSnippet: That s got to be the stupidest exploit I have ever heard.  I seriously hope you were being sarcastic John.  I wonder, if a guard will attack you if you attack
ygData.messageBody:
That's got to be the stupidest exploit I have ever heard. I seriously hope
you were being sarcastic John. I wonder, if a guard will attack you if you
attack a player, since you are a player, will attacking yourself cause him
to kill you?

-----Original Message-----
From: kim@... [mailto:kim@...]
Sent: Monday, October 04, 1999 1:34 PM
To: eqbards@onelist.com
Subject: Re: [eqbards] Bard vs Wizard race?


From: <kim@...>

On Tue, 5 Oct 1999, Wayne Sheppard wrote:
>
> If the race was serious, the bard could just suicide against a guard and
be
> instantly teleported right back to Freeport, beating the wizard. Put all
> your stuff in the bank first to make it easier. And if you are worried
> about the experience loss, kill yourself instead. No exp loss there.

Heh. This is a great idea. Next time you're doing a
Freeport/Qeynos/Freeport or Freeport/Kelethin/Freeport run,
put all your stuff in the bank (now that no-drops will go in),
and kill yourself.

--
John H. Kim
kim@...
